long_description:
Gives mod makers a set of functions to safely apply player physics overrides.

Add a named override which can be used to add or subtract from speed, jump and gravity effects, or set custom overrides for "default", "min",  "max", "force".

	pova.add_override (player_name, override_item, override_table)

Remove the override for the item named:

	pova.del_override(player_name, override_item)

Returns a table containing {speed, jump, gravity} setting for the item added:

	pova.get_override(player_name, override_item)

Calculates and sets new override instantly:

	pova.do_override(player)
